description: Generates actionable next steps based on assessment urgency level

immediate_actions: Schedule an appointment with your gastroenterologist within 1-3 days.
self_monitoring_guidelines: Keep a daily symptom diary noting any changes or new symptoms.
Monitor for any worsening of your symptoms.
when_to_seek_help: Contact your doctor if your symptoms worsen before your scheduled appointment.
Seek immediate care if you experience severe symptoms.
preparation_for_visit: Prepare a list of your current medications and any symptoms you have been experiencing.
Write down any questions or concerns you would like to discuss with the doctor.
lifestyle_considerations: Stay hydrated and maintain a balanced diet.
Avoid any known triggers that may exacerbate your symptoms.
result.follow_up_timeline: Schedule an appointment with your gastroenterologist within 1-3 days.
result.action_summary: Ensure to see your gastroenterologist soon to address your current symptoms with professional evaluation.
result.important_disclaimer: This plan is for guidance only and does not replace professional medical advice. Please consult with your healthcare provider for any medical concerns.
